sql unified xnet - restore
Bernard Bou

DATABASE

If you download the SQL statements (instead of of a ready-made database, in SqLite format for example), you'll need to restore the database.

  • 1-select and download the modules from the download area into a common space.
  • 2-decompress the zip files
  • 3-under Linux and Unix systems, you need to make the restore.sh file executable
  • 4-run restore-[mysql][bat|sh]

- unless you modify the scripts you'll need to have CREATE access to the database

- the -d switch deletes an existing database database
